title: twiki
author: twiki
created_time: September 07, 2022, 01:45:04 PMLast edit: September 09, 2022, 11:46:37 AM by twiki
content: Hello! Please tell me where can I buy cold traffic for the site? I would like to test my platform-site and I need cold traffic.I think that 10-30 thousandth traffic would be sufficient (1-3 day).

comments.author: twiki
comments.body: upThis is a project that accepts Bitcoins and me need to check whether everything will be in order!

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: twiki on September 09, 2022, 11:47:34 AMThis is a project that accepts Bitcoins and me need to check whether everything will be in order!  Hello twiki.I'm a web developer and i have reported bugs in crypto related sites in the past. If you want send me a PM with the link and i will take a look. If i find any bug i will let you know.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on September 09, 2022, 02:54:13 PMQuote from: twiki on September 09, 2022, 11:47:34 AMThis is a project that accepts Bitcoins and me need to check whether everything will be in order!  Hello twiki.I'm a web developer and i have reported bugs in crypto related sites in the past. If you want send me a PM with the link and i will take a look. If i find any bug i will let you know.I am not sure why didn't he leave a link to the site here, surely he would get some more useful suggestions.OP, we talked through PM, but it seems that you didn't accept what I write to you.

comments.author: BitcoinsGreat
comments.body: Quote from: twiki on September 07, 2022, 01:45:04 PMHello! Please tell me where can I buy cold traffic for the site? I would like to test my platform-site and I need cold traffic.I think that 10-30 thousandth traffic would be sufficient (1-3 day).What do you mean by cold traffic? Never heard of this term before.Also, can you share the name of the site so that people may visit your site and this is also a way to increase the traffic on your site organically.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinsGreat on September 13, 2022, 03:39:27 PMWhat do you mean by cold traffic? Never heard of this term before.-snip"Cold traffic is a segment of people who have not heard of or interacted with your brand before. When these people click on your ads it is not because they have heard of your brand, it is simply because they are intrigued by what you are promoting. This group of people is more often than not searching for a solution."credits to Google
